verbs.description: Trumpeter Wynton Marsalis [V: has] released a statement clarifying his remarks to a Washington Post reporter about the relative dangers of rap and hip hop music and Confederate - era statues to the black community .

[ARG0: Trumpeter Wynton Marsalis] has [V: released] [ARG1: a statement clarifying his remarks to a Washington Post reporter about the relative dangers of rap and hip hop music and Confederate - era statues to the black community] .

Trumpeter Wynton Marsalis has released [ARG0: a statement] [V: clarifying] [ARG1: his remarks to a Washington Post reporter about the relative dangers of rap and hip hop music and Confederate - era statues to the black community] .
